Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct Loki::DefaultLifetime< T >

Implementation of the LifetimePolicy used by SingletonHolder Schedules an object's destruction as per C++ rules Forwards to std::atexit /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////.
